8e43284e4c8deda3c75f6906d9856ea768ea3014.commit.message:
WikiSecurityEvent gains the event type PROFILE_SAVED, emitted by UserDatabase. Most of the security events are now marked as "debug" level events, which means the logs will be much less chatty (this is a temporary hack).

772ad21c8afa985e407a2f9dc5f5ec7cdb97ed72.commit.message:
Class made final. WikiSecurityEvent gains the event type PROFILE_SAVED, emitted by UserDatabase. The WikiEventSource "marker interface"  added to class declarations for AuthorizationManager, UserManager, AuthenticationManager, WikiEngine. EventSourceDelegate used in place of cut-and-paste code for these classes also.

6448851f691ebda78873d0bf73943e658b50da91.commit.message:
SecurityVerifier adds tests for GroupPermission. Better support for detecting exceptions. Adds tests for adding/deleting Groups.

More use of checked exceptions. Authorizer.initialize() throws WikiSecurityException.

1b9b9e812848564a4b497af513bda19a07f8707f.commit.message:
More use of checked exceptions. Authorizer.initialize() throws WikiSecurityException. AuthorizationManager gains a new public method: getAuthorizer(). The WikiEventSource "marker interface"  added to class declarations for AuthorizationManager AuthenticationManager, WikiEngine. EventSourceDelegate used in place of cut-and-paste code for these classes also.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/jspwiki/trunk@625475 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

c7da3013418e9ccefd39b694878c9d867bfa9e63.commit.message:
Group principal injection responsibilities moves to WikiSession from AuthenticationManager. Container role principals are now injected at login time by WebContainerLoginModule, rather than the AuthenticationManager. The WikiEventSource "marker interface"  added to class declarations for AuthorizationManager, AuthenticationManager, WikiEngine. EventSourceDelegate used in place of cut-and-paste code for these classes also.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/jspwiki/trunk@625474 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
